== Devolution - technology changes, lessons learned ==

web GIS interface: php/mapserver -> openlayers/javascript/ajax

latest in-situ obs: RDB - obs hard-coded/table approach -> xenia,obskml,dsi (obs non-specific)

hourly gridded data: RDB quickscat, layers -> ogr/sql+shapefiles

full RDB to file-based RDB: postgresql+postgis -> sqlite+ogr, sqlitegeo?

hosted web/productivity services: zope/plone, trac, web stats -> webhosting(hostmonster.com), google code/analytics ?
